Package cdx.opencdx.commons.service.impl

Class OpenCDXOrderMessageServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
cdx.opencdx.commons.service.impl.OpenCDXOrderMessageServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OpenCDXOrderMessageService
@Service public class OpenCDXOrderMessageServiceImpl extends Object implements OpenCDXOrderMessageService
The OpenCDXOrderMessageServiceImpl class is responsible for submitting orders to the OpenCDXMessageService.
